Class ShaderNode represents a shader node in the AST. It holds collections of imports, exports, structs, typedefs, functions, global variables, constant buffers. So summary: class models a shader's abstract syntax tree node, aggregating top-level elements of a shader program. Business intent: to provide a structured representation of a shader's source code for analysis, transformation, or code generation. Keywords: shader, AST, node, imports, exports, structs, typedefs, functions, global variables, constant buffers, representation, parsing, compilation.

Make JSON. Ensure no method names listed. Provide summary, business_intent, keywords list. Let's craft.

JSON format:

{

  "business_intent": "...",
  "keywords": [...]
}
